attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition attempts to clear up past offence therebye giving some weight to future overseas policy, at the moment nothing the British government and its opposition and allies' says can be taken seriously as regards human rights, in fact it seems to be a cynical joke when the protagonists of the Mi Lai massacre are living free and happily gloating, when the victims (some of who are dying now, 50 years on) of 'agent orange' go completely uncompensated and mocked. BRING THE WAR CRIMINALS TOO JUSTICE: PUT IT RIGHT NOW, MAKE IT SERIOUS.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
